snippet.title: The Man in the Fields - Trailer
snippet.description:
🕹️ Get The Man in the Fields on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3051180?utm_source=youtube

🕹️ Get The Man in the Fields on Itch: https://ravineinteractive.itch.io/the-man-in-the-fields

The Man in the Fields is a first person horror game based on a Creepypasta ritual of the same name. Once you summon The Man in the Fields, every door and item in your house will be opened. Close everything in time to prevent it from getting in. If you successfully complete the ritual, you will be granted wealth and safety.

During the ritual you may or may not encounter a shadowy man in your house. Try not to worry about him too much. He is not The Man in the Fields, he is a herald.

But heed this warning:
DO NOT LOOK INTO THE FIELDS! If you do, you will see a man with elongated limbs starting to move towards your house. You must lock yourself in a safe room with a crucifix, before it finds a way in.
